# context

**Instance Property**

The launch information for the application controller.

## Declaration

```swift
var context: TVApplicationControllerContext { get }
```

## Discussion

The launch information contains the JavaScript application URL, [doc://com.apple.tvmlkit/documentation/TVMLKit/TVApplicationControllerContext/storageIdentifier], and [doc://com.apple.tvmlkit/documentation/TVMLKit/TVApplicationControllerContext/launchOptions]. The URL can point to a local or remote resource. `launchOptions` can be constructed and forwarded from launch options keys that are part of UIApplication. See Launch Options Keys.

## Examining App Controller Properties

- **navigationController**: The navigation controller that is bridged from JavaScript to tvOS.
- **window**: A reference to the window supplied when the app controller was initialized.
